generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and tram tracks running down the center, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: Pedestrians are visible walking on a designated path on the right side of the road, separated by a curb or barrier, which is a sidewalk.
- building: Structures with walls and windows are visible in the background and on the right side of the image, indicating buildings.
- wall: A stone wall is visible on the right side of the road, near the sidewalk, which qualifies as a wall.
- pole: Several vertical poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs, which are poles.
- traffic light: Traffic light boxes are visible on the right side of the road, near the sidewalk.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on the left side of the road, mounted on a pole.
- vegetation: Trees and other greenery are visible along the sides of the road and in the background.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the bridge and trees, appearing as an open sky.
- person: Multiple pedestrians are visible walking on the sidewalk and crossing the road.
- rider: A person is visible riding a bicycle on the road.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including a gray SUV in the foreground and a silver car in the middle of the road.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible on the road, being ridden by a person.
- train: A train is partially visible on the left side of the image, behind some trees and a bridge.
